nodes.label: ctx . accounts . foundry . owner = ctx . accounts . smith . key () ;
ctx . accounts . foundry . state = ForgeState :: Open ;

for _ in 0 .. steps { ctx . accounts . materials . iron = ctx . accounts . materials . iron . saturating_add (2) ; ctx . accounts . materials . coal = ctx . accounts . materials . coal . saturating_add (1) ; ctx . accounts . journal . success = ctx . accounts . journal . success . saturating_add (1) ; }
ctx . accounts . materials . iron = ctx . accounts . materials . iron . saturating_add (2) ;
ctx . accounts . materials . coal = ctx . accounts . materials . coal . saturating_add (1) ;
ctx . accounts . journal . success = ctx . accounts . journal . success . saturating_add (1) ;

if steps > ctx . accounts . foundry . target_heat { ctx . accounts . foundry . state = ForgeState :: Closed ; ctx . accounts . materials . ready = 0 ; ctx . accounts . journal . failure = ctx . accounts . journal . failure . saturating_add (1) ; msg ! ("overheat; close foundry") ; } else { ctx . accounts . foundry . state = ForgeState :: Open ; ctx . accounts . materials . ready = 1 ; ctx . accounts . journal . success = ctx . accounts . journal . success . saturating_add (1) ; msg ! ("good temper; continue") ; }
ctx . accounts . foundry . state = ForgeState :: Closed ;
ctx . accounts . journal . failure = ctx . accounts . journal . failure . saturating_add (1) ;
ctx . accounts . foundry . state = ForgeState :: Open ;
ctx . accounts . journal . success = ctx . accounts . journal . success . saturating_add (1) ;
